mapper.sql: t.id, t.eqp_id, t.lot_no, t.production_name, t.production_no, t.order_no, t.lot_yield, t.lot_yield_eqp, t.start_time, t.end_time, t.step_id, t.step_code, t.remarks, t.create_by, t.create_date, t.update_by, t.update_date, t.del_flag
mapper.select: select * from mes_lot_track where (PRODUCTION_NO, LOT_NO, start_time ) in (SELECT PRODUCTION_NO, LOT_NO , max(start_time) FROM mes_lot_track WHERE ( PRODUCTION_NO, LOT_NO ) NOT IN (select DISTINCT PRODUCTION_NO, LOT_NO from mes_lot_track where eqp_id LIKE '%SIM-TRM%' AND END_TIME IS NOT NULL and create_date between #{startTime} and #{endTime} ) and create_date between #{startTime} and #{endTime} group by PRODUCTION_NO,LOT_NO) order by start_time
